name: Alibi (Yufeng Liu)
description:
This project is part of Unity Newbies Jam 2022 with theme End where you started

The year is 2022. You the thief master of all time met a new challenge. Collectors now put AI in their CCTV. The AI scans the art pieces and if something is missing, the alarm goes off. But this naive bot should not be a problem to you, right?

Manual:

Press space to start the game

Press 1-9 to use items

Press L to leave the room

Goal:

Make sure everything looks the same as they were when you entered the room. Get the highest value!

Credits:

Program - Yufeng Liu

Art - Ziqiu Lin

Design - Junting Zhu, Yu Xia

Balance - Runze Wang
